content.text: Match ends, Southampton 0, Wolverhampton Wanderers 2.
Second Half ends, Southampton 0, Wolverhampton Wanderers 2.
Offside, Wolverhampton Wanderers. Michal Zyro tries a through ball, but Donovan Wilson is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Nathan Redmond (Southampton) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Sam McQueen.
Corner,  Southampton. Conceded by Michal Zyro.
Goal!  Southampton 0, Wolverhampton Wanderers 2. Donovan Wilson (Wolverhampton Wanderers) left footed shot from the left side of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Michal Zyro.
Foul by Jack Price (Wolverhampton Wanderers).
